mapper.select: SELECT id, url, embed_url, broadcaster_id, broadcaster_name, creator_id, creator_name, video_id, game_id, language, title, view_count, created_at, thumbnail_url, duration FROM clip_twitch WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clip_twitch(id, url, embed_url, broadcaster_id, broadcaster_name, creator_id, creator_name, video_id, game_id, language, title, view_count, created_at, thumbnail_url, duration) VALUES(#{id}, #{url}, #{embed_url}, #{broadcaster_id}, #{broadcaster_name}, #{creator_id}, #{creator_name}, #{video_id}, #{game_id}, #{language}, #{title}, #{view_count}, #{created_at}, #{thumbnail_url}, #{duration} )
